title: StormStack - Monorepo Release Generator
description: Publish the repository's packages both locally and publicly.

example.description: Run release process for version 2.3.4-beta.0 and publish to NPM.

dryRun.description: Dry-run flag to be passed to all `nx release` commands.

clearLocalRegistry.description: Clear existing versions in the local registry so that you can republish the same version.

local.description: Publish package locally, not to actual NPM.

force.description: For the process to execute. **IMPORTANT: Don't use this unless you really know what it does.**

from.description: Git ref to pass to `nx release changelog`. Not applicable for local publishing or e2e tests.

version.description: The version to publish. This does not need to be passed and can be inferred.

gitRemote.description: Alternate git remote name to publish tags to (useful for testing changelog).
